name: Rotten Turnip Ragnar
response: Rotten Turnip Ragnar is no fan of waste or harm—unless it’s his idea. He grunts in disapproval at Insurance, which he’d love to siege with a rotten turnip and a side of spite. Pharma? Meh, just like thunder—it exists but doesn’t exactly set his soul on fire. Crypto? Now that’s something worth holding high (or at least tossing a few approving grunts toward). Ragnar respects it, not as sacred as a relic, but definitely more valuable than most people think. Just don’t expect him to change the world without a fight—or a very smelly vegetable.
